website_summaries.verdict: This tamale steamer is tall enough for standing tamales on their ends for steaming and wide enough to pack them in by the dozen.
pros: Made of heavy gauge stainless steel
Comes with perforated metal divider keeps tamales out of water
cons: Pot bottom may not be perfectly flat, so it might rattle when water is at a rolling boil

customer_reviews.title: Great for loads of big tamales
customer_reviews.text: Tall enough to stand big tamales on end for cooking and big enough to fit dozens and dozens of them! Made several batches so far with this pot and love it. I have a glass cooktop and the pot bottom is apparently not perfectly flat so it rattled around on the cooktop when the water was boiling to steam the tamales. Worth the noise in my view given the tamale-licious results.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia H.

customer_reviews.title: Professional Quality, Home Cooking Size Pot
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived. Good quality stainless steel. Rack fits in groove about 2" from bottom of pot, allowing lobsters and other food to be cooked by steaming and not boiling. Fits well on our stove top.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good
customer_reviews.text: Made tamales for the 1st time. This pot is very good quality better than the ones I've seen in the local grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t as cheap as the other ones I’ve bought. Made tamales, worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: ROSE

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for steaming stuff,  but I wouldn't recommend for commercial use.
customer_reviews.text: A little thin on the material, but holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bigron513

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a perfect size and just the right size for the stove top.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Pot for crab legs
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect pot for steaming Alaskan King crab legs. Plenty of room inside and enough water to steam without a need to refill. The handles are good and sturdy. The material is quality. I love this pot and will make tamales next time.
customer_reviews.author: Pammy LA

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a stainless
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a stainless, steamer. A flawless finish, not one scratch or dent. Can't wait to fill it up with my home made tamales.
customer_reviews.author: Tamale Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love love love it. So easy to clean and it steams my Crablegs...yummy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Crab Steamer
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 1 thing only: Crabs. It worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Blackstar5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality. my wife was very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. my wife was very pleased. Very well made and not flimsy feeling like past pots we've bought.
customer_reviews.author: Jason and Brandy Rock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but it is good quality. Not thin metal.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sanders
